presentationColumns.name: Days Payables Outstanding
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Closing Amount * Number of days in a selected period) / (Invoice Amount - Credit Memo Amount - Debit Memo Amount). This metric will provide correct value only when used with common or pillar specific dimensions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Compound.Days Payables Outstanding from Aging

presentationColumns.name: AP Turnover
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : ((Invoice Amount - Credit Memo Amount - Debit Memo Amount )* 365) / (Closing Amount * Number of days in a selected period). This metric will provide correct value only when used with common or pillar specific dimensions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Compound.AP Turnover from Aging
